LanguageData.Aurora.stages.beautiful_aurora.label: beautiful aurora
LanguageData.ColonistLeftUnburied.stages.colonist_lef: One of us died and we're just leaving them lying in the open. Nobody should be left like that. People deserve a decent burial.
LanguageData.DoingPassionateWork.stages.burning_passi: I love my work. I could do this all day, every day.
LanguageData.Joywire.stages.joywire.label: joywire
LanguageData.MissingTongue.stages.missing_tongue.desc: I am missing my tongue. It is so frustrating not being able to speak!
LanguageData.Naked.stages.naked.label: naked
LanguageData.Pain.stages.minor_pain.label: minor pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.serious_pain.label: serious pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.intense_pain.label: intense pain
LanguageData.Pain.stages.intense_pain.description: Make it stop... make it stop... make it stop...
LanguageData.Pain.stages.mindshattering_pain.label: mind-shattering pain
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.psychic_soothe.label: psychic soothe
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.psychic_soothe.descr: It's like a calming voice at the back of my mind, soothing me, settling my nerves.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.low_psychic_drone.de: It's like a scratching at the back of my mind. A voice, whispering. I can only make out a few words, and I don't like them.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.moderate_psychic_dro: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.high_psychic_drone.d: The voice is unbearably loud. It's hard to concentrate. I find myself talking back to it, yelling at it. But it just keeps shouting!
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.stages.extreme_psychic_dron: My heart pounds and I'm sweating. All I can think of is hurting and suffering and all these enemies around me. They're my nightmare, my nightmare, my nightmare...
LanguageData.PsychicEmanatorSoothe.stages.psychic_ema: The psychic emanator makes me feel strange, but also very relaxed.
LanguageData.RotStink.stages.rot_stink.label: rot stink
LanguageData.RotStink.stages.rot_stink.description: A rotten stink invades my nostrils and sticks to my skin. It makes me sick.
LanguageData.RotStink.stages.awful_rot_stink.label: awful rot stink
LanguageData.RotStink.stages.awful_rot_stink.descript: The stench of rot is so thick I almost feel like I'm swimming in it. I can hardly breathe in this filth!
LanguageData.RotStinkLingering.stages.rot_stink_linge: That rot stink was horrible - and it feels like it's still stuck to me.
LanguageData.SharedBed.stages.sharing_bed.label: sharing bed
LanguageData.SharedBed.stages.sharing_bed.description: I have to share a bed with someone who I don't particularly want to.
